original_text: And Moses turned, and went down from the mount, and the two tables of the testimony were in his hand: the tables were written on both their sides; on the one side and on the other were they written.
korean_text: 모세가 돌이켜 산에서 내려오는데 두 증거판이 그의 손에 있고 그 판의 양면 이쪽 저쪽에 글자가 있으니

sentences.original_text: and went down from the mount
and the two tables of the testimony were in his hand
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 증거의 두 판이 그의 손에 있었다

sentences.original_text: the tables were written on both their sides
sentences.korean_translation: 그 판들은 양면에 글이 쓰여 있었다

sentences.original_text: on the one side and on the other were they written
sentences.korean_translation: 한쪽 면과 다른 쪽 면에 모두 글이 쓰여 있었다
